website_summaries.verdict: Bluetooth headphones featuring Adaptive Noise Cancellation, with pause and shut-off controlled by physical positioning: SMART.
pros: Features Adaptive Noise Cancellation to provide superior sound anywhere you are
Built with same drive units as B&W's P9 signature headphones to optimize quality, and slightly angled drivers for a natural stereo effect
Pauses or stops in response to lifting ear cup or putting headphones down
cons: Some buyers found the headset uncomfortable, and there were also a few mixed reviews on sound quality compared to other manufacturers

website_summaries.verdict: The Bowers & Wilkins PX wireless headphones are a rare misfire from the iconic audio company, with buggy operation and audio performance that changes when the noise cancellation is enabled.
pros: Powerful audio performance with rich bass and crisp highs
Noise cancellation can be turned off
App allows for nuanced NC adjustments
cons: Can't be used in wired passive mode—cable requires power

customer_reviews.title: Headphones to beat in 2018 in regards to sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny,let it play for over 300-350 hours to get maximum of the headphone sound. I use it on a daily basis for over 6-8 hours and they can hold up to 3 days depending if your gaming or listening to music.Arrived on time without any issues. In the price range in my opinion there is no better sound quality headphones. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Zarko Jeftovic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best head phones I have ever owned well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: mj chapman

customer_reviews.title: The best ever delivery in sound
customer_reviews.text: OMG...The best ever delivery in sound, comfort and quality!...No regrets spending my extra earned savings..Many thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. Leigh

customer_reviews.title: do not ignore those 1-2 star reviews...
customer_reviews.text: I did ignore those said these are too tight and very uncomfortable. Thought to myself, hey may be they all have big heads?! But no... I have no idea what the target audience is for these, but they are very tight and almost impossible to wear with glasses/shades longer than 10 minutes, and in those 10 minutes arms of your glasses will be permanently intended to your head...
customer_reviews.author: Mehmet Yucel

customer_reviews.title: The glorious sound of silence
customer_reviews.text: A very high quality set of headphones but as wuth other headphones had fit issues with my big old head. The noise cancelling was ok but not up there with Sony. But.... The sound quality was simply sublime! Rich warm bass and refreshing highs the sound really blew me away! To be honest am a bit sad that I had to return these but the comfort was just not right. I did find that the material on the headband came loose when wearing them as if it had not be glued down correctly. Which was a shame. If you want amazing sounding headphones these are for you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Go Tee Gadgets

customer_reviews.title: Amazon peddling older (broken/faulty) gen at same price
customer_reviews.text: **Update** B&W customer service was great and have since offered a new hard case FOC. The new headphones (From John Lewis) work great and no issues so far with them, sound is great and battery is excellent ! **original review** Didn’t power on, charged - still no power. Sent back same day! No very good given their price point. Went to John Lewis, bought another pair and the case was a newer softer look (not the hard case that Amazon sent). Compared the accessories with the current images on the B&W website and they show the newer soft case - so this means Amazon is selling, pushing older and clearly broken / faulty stock. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. O. Brien

customer_reviews.title: Great, But Uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great, but... Bought as a Christmas present but the recipient had to return as after around 10-20 mins or so of putting it on, he complained that the band was hurting the top of his head, was too tight and uncomfortable. Reluctantly had to sell/exchange it for a similar model. He has since settled for the Bose QC35 II. He said that the sound/bass was not as good as the B&W, but the Bose headphones were lighter and comfortable enough to wear for a few hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: B Liu

customer_reviews.title: Detailed refined sound once run for a good few hours.
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews on high end noise cancelling headphones I was tempted by the Bose offering but I always trust What HiFi's views and they were spot on. These headphones offer detailed sound and once broken in they sound great. The trade off with giving such detail is that if the source is below par it will sound worse in these that perhaps the other offerings. They are really comfortable and easy to use along with app support. There is a firmware update through the app too so get that on and enjoy the Orchestra in your ears.
customer_reviews.author: M. Farley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality if you take time to adapt it to your needs.
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully engineered with excellent sound quality. Environmental control with the app offers a variety of sound control for different situations and levels of sensitivity . These are important as, for me, I needed an initial period of experiment to find the correct level and avoid unwanted drop out. Once found and with the normal period of burning in ( two or three days) the headphones came into their excellent sonic life. They are expensive it is true but with patience they do out perform in my opinion competitors in their price range. Comfort is also a very personal matter. I use them predominantly in a household situation and they meet my requirements well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M

customer_reviews.title: You need to try first.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my Sennheiser Momentum wireless these have a warmer more natural sound to my ears. Connecting is easy and range is good walking around the house. I have a 59 head and these are pretty compressive on the side of my head and not as comfy as the sennheiser. Only time will tell if they give a bit as I'm not prepared to try and open them physically. Build quality is excellent and plush. We all hear differently so reviews about the sound are pointless in my opinion. Try for yourself is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. O.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic. My second pair of.B&W headphones and they dont disappoint. Coming from the P7 series, these are just as good, just with the extra feature of pausing the headphones when you taken them off your head. Give them a.little time to loosen up and properly run in, you will be rewarded with excellent clarity, tight bass and a rich warm midrange...well.worth the outlay.
customer_reviews.author: Nath.

customer_reviews.title: great to look at
customer_reviews.text: beautiful headphones and nice sound quality but function is nowhere as good as the Sony headphones, I wanted the nicer B&W headphones but they are not too comfortable, the app is poor and the sound quality ok, Sony headphones look cheaper but better in every category
customer_reviews.author: Karol

customer_reviews.title: Less than a year old and no longer work wirelessly
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my daughter and despite limited use, they are now kaput! In contrast my Bose QC's are rock solid. I also recently bought B&O beoplay for my wife - which sound wise trump the others by a mile - which came as a shock to me tbh. Being a big B&W fan - I have B&W ceiling and wall speakers in two lounges, and three bathrooms - I was hoping they would be as reliable as those products (which are superb). Real shame. A real let down.
customer_reviews.author: Dojo

customer_reviews.title: Beautifull design and build quality but...
customer_reviews.text: ...poor Bluetooth connectivity and uncomfortably snug ear cups made them unusable for me. I had continual Bluetooth mini disconnects even when my music source was within a couple of meters. The ear cups were a little too small for my ears (which, I've never thought of as being over-large!). The grip on the head was also a little too tight and became uncomfortable after about an hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: Gezci

customer_reviews.title: Utterly Brilliant Headphones.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of B&W Headphones and they are even better than my previous ones. They look absolutely stunning, sound amazing and the build quality of everything is just exceptional. Not the cheapest (although they were a bit of a steal on Black Friday) but worth every penny in my opinion. Really comfortable to wear and the quality of the sound across the range is something you have to experience to believe, fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Wade

customer_reviews.title: Better than my beats studio 3
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best set of head speakers I have ever had even better than my gameboy ones and I loved them a lot, Hand one to the hot girl on the bus and share some quality tape. You can’t do that but you can look out the window and imagine your not on a bus which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: MeggaDad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic, good sound, variable ANC, well better than Bose QC 35. I use to be a Bose fan, not anymore. There is no dropouts with these (unlike the QC 35’s, I sent the first pair back, still the same). I have a pair of B&O H9i’s, the BW’s are better sound, though I love the controls on the B&O H9i. So 1st BW Px, 2nd B&O H9i and a very distant 3rd Bose QC 35.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful musical experience
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed all the major makes and chose Bowers & Wilkins and I have to say they are perfect for my needs, from the presentation to the latest software updates the ease of setup, the immediate connection and pausing off music, the finish is outstanding,w and I have found no problems as to the weight, and the sound oh the sound is brilliant well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: typecast

customer_reviews.title: Amazon warehouse deal
customer_reviews.text: This is the third warehouse deal I have bought and the third one to be returned. The headphones are superb looking, just what I've always wanted.......unfortunately they will not pair and my devices tell me that the headphones are at fault. Returned and four weeks for Amazon refund. Bought Cowin SE7 to replace and they have had no problem at all pairing....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes my world a far more bearable place.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant. Just brilliant. Sexy style. Incredible sound. I love these. Second pair due to an accident with my first pair. Slipped & fell & the arm snapped. Totally distraught. Decided that couldn’t live life without them in my life so bit the bullet & decided to live on rice & beans for a month. Luckily enough it was Black Friday so they were discounted.
customer_reviews.author: Mr NJ Jones

customer_reviews.title: For me better than the Sony 1000XM3
customer_reviews.text: I switched the Sony 1000XM3 for these and pleased I did. Better build quality, look much nicer and importantly for me the call quality is a LOT better. ANC not as good but still decent. Overall a premier set of headphones from a British company
customer_reviews.author: Row JH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound and build quality
customer_reviews.text: Got quite a few pairs of headphones & in ear buds but these blow all of them out the water. Superb sound stage, just enough base without being over powering, mellow mids & crisp highs. True pleasure to listen to. Makes you fall in love with music all over again. Dead easy to set up and pair too especially with iPhone. Build quality is spot on as well. Love the combination of blue and gold on the pair I bought. Not cheap but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: sheldon s cooper

customer_reviews.title: Much better build quality than equivalent Sony headphones. Excellent sound.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent headphones. After a good amount of running in, they reveal a very spacious sound with great insight. Base is initially lean, but improves significantly after running in. Try and feed them an aptX HD Bluetooth source as the sound is significantly better (although is still very good through iPhone). A word of caution if you are considering purchasing the Sony MDR1000 - a crack in the bracket appeared in mine, and Sony were utterly useless in repairing them (notwithstanding the fact the cracking issue is very well documented around the internet).The build quality of these is vastly superior as they seem to be made of metal and don’t flex when you take them on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Jon68

customer_reviews.title: Expensive. Yes. But worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked my wired B&W headset. Beautiful sound for hi-res music streaming and good old CDs without compression. Best I've ever tried. New ipad only supports bluetooth :( These were the nearest i could find to my wired set. Hated having to buy a second set of top notch headphones for in-house listening, but these are excellent. Good fit. Great sound. Long battery life. Only quibble - the LED that indicates charging is quite bright if charging in a bedroom when sleeping at night. Maybe a way to turn these off. Didn't find it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ahern

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality but some of the additional features are somewhat hit and miss
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great. The highs are clear as glass and the lows aren’t exaggerated while the mids are balanced. The product itself is beautiful and feels comfortable. The noise cancellation is good but can’t really rate as I don’t have a lot of experience with a lot of other noise cancelling headsets. It certainly makes travelling a lot more bearable. But the wear sensor leaves a lot to be desired. It’s really temperamental. Sometimes it works beautifully, but half the time I put my headphones down and forget about them until they suddenly start playing to themselves, presumably because the wear sensor must have activated.
customer_reviews.author: David WILES

customer_reviews.title: A beautifully constructed and styled pair of headphones with a warm, round sound.
customer_reviews.text: Construction - first-class, solid and well capable of taking knocks. Comfort - head tension is considerable and not terribly comfortable but may ease over time. Features - a good assortment, well thought-out and implemented. Sound - All frequencies represented with impressive sound stage but emphasises the lows and lower mids presenting vocals in a more rounded and less true-to-life way.
customer_reviews.author: sparkijones

customer_reviews.title: Pairing issues
customer_reviews.text: I am so-o-o disappointed. The headphones are perfect in every way....except one......namely that they will not pair with my Bluetooth devices. I have attempted to pair them many times with no result. I even bought a new Bluetooth transmitter to bypass my TV`s internal Bluetooth transmitter and connected the new transmitter via the SPDTF Optical/Digital audio OUT of the TV.....but to no avail. I have watched little blue lights flashing for ages but not a pairing to be seen.
customer_reviews.author: Wise owl

customer_reviews.title: Great crystal clear sound, durable and immersive!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pair. Bought it roughly a year ago. To me this is the first wireless pair that actually sounded well good, looked great and was comfortable to use ( that battery life tho ^^ ) Dropped them once running, picked them up - everything worked perfectly. +1 Bowers & Wilkins I don't use the sensors to pause the music as I take my headphones off anyway while talking to a person, on the other hand the noise isolation is my guardian angel against London's noisy commute. Never out of the house without them. Yay B&W
customer_reviews.author: Tomas

customer_reviews.title: Stunning set of headphones, Built to last
customer_reviews.text: Simply incredible. there is practically nothing bad about these headphones and so much good that you can say. The Audio, Connectivity, Features, Noise Cancellation, Comfort, Build quality and Battery are all of a high quality nature. well worth the money and I look forward to recommending them endlessly to all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: poor quality overall
customer_reviews.text: Too much bass, poor sound, and noise cancelling not as efficient as a good closed headphones. It is too heavy as well. For the same price you could get the beyerdynamics DT 1770 Pro, that is just amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Quality set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of headphones which also look the part. They take a little bit of time to break in but once they do you'll really notice the difference. Only slight downside is the case offers little to no protection, would have expect more for the price. But overall its the headphones I paid the money for and they haven't disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rory

customer_reviews.title: Amazing battery life and sound. Noise cancelling 4out of 5
customer_reviews.text: So sound is amazing Build quality is great Noise cancelling - on the plane I could still hear faint noise, but it was very good. Only downside is they are quite tight, and after 5-6hours they become a bit too uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Computer man Dan

customer_reviews.title: Constant stuttering and involuntary pausing
customer_reviews.text: I used these for an afternoon before returning them. Intermittent stuttering from (presumably) poor bluetooth might have been bad luck. But the automatic pausing activating while the headphones are still sitting on my head is just bad design.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Astounding sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth buying if sound quality is important to you. It can only be worn for two hours at most because it gets uncomfortable around the ears where the leather starts to dig into your flesh. Otherwise looks great and the battery life is phenomenal. The noise cancellation isn’t that effective but not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Alegria

customer_reviews.title: Sadly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had really high hopes for these but was so disappointed :( sound quality was not anywhere near what I would expect - just standard. noise cancellation was amazing however as was being able to take a call thanks to the many microphones built in. I did end up returning this though. as they kept cutting out in calls and whilst I was walking sometimes. even with the special music stop feature turned off. these also looked incredibly bulky on my small head. such a shape because they were a beautiful looking set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Amazebobs
customer_reviews.text: I own senheiser, bose, and akg headphones,they are not a patch on these bowers and wilkins,what an amazing set of phones, the sound quality is amazing, battery life is awesome, the best headphones i have purchased, i cannot fault these headphones in any way, there has been reviews that say they are heavy and uncomfortable on your head, i have not found this to be the case. These headphones are well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bowie

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Great product ! Worth paying the money ! Nice fit, very good sound quality, a few interesting features ... One of the best ( if not The Best ) pair of wireless noise cancelling headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Mihnea Spataru

customer_reviews.title: Was not happy with this item
customer_reviews.text: Have returned this item because I wasn't happy with the sound quality and the way it was built. It felt very cheap for primnium heaphone. And the sound quality was much inferior than some headphones casting far less.
customer_reviews.author: Salim Abdulrahman

customer_reviews.title: Too bulky and don't fold up
customer_reviews.text: I liked the design of these headphones but they are very big and bulky. Unfortunately I had to return them as they don't fold up so the case is really big and heavy making them impractical for travelling. The sound was decent but there is better out there.
customer_reviews.author: Miss A

customer_reviews.title: Simply stunning
customer_reviews.text: Build quality, sound quality, noise cancelling. These headphones got all in highest level, I am big music fan and listen everywhere, bought these for gym and general listening and they are brilliant. Not cheap but worth every penny Very useful app too.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones look great the quality is excellent and the sound is great .The service from Amazon was very good they arrived before the estimated time ,the packaging was excellent .I use these head phones for listening to the TV.and on my computer .I would recommend them they are an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Heavey

customer_reviews.title: The best headphones known to man
customer_reviews.text: Every now and again you purchase an item that you think is just the best thing you ever own and this is one of them. Everything that is pumped up and “sold” about the brilliance of this item is 100% true. Best feature?? You lift the earpiece off of your ear and whatever is playing pauses - I love that - oh And the look and feel of the headphones and did I mention the sound quality - just all round brilliance and perfection
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headphones that intermittently connect
customer_reviews.text: On the rare occasion these cans connect and let you hear music it is an OK experience. Not as good as the much cheaper Grados but not bad. However the main problem is the temperamental blue tooth connectivity. On Mac, PC and iPhone I have had massively frustrating experiences getting these to connect - despite being a techie.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Keep pausing music
customer_reviews.text: Keep pausing on iPhone x with the latest ios, Done many things but didn't help... Anyone else has the same issue?
customer_reviews.author: Rouzbeh

customer_reviews.title: Almost great
customer_reviews.text: These sound great, the noise cancellation is good, and they look great. Controls are a bit fiddly but the biggest issue I had is how tight the band is. Very uncomfortable for me after an hour or so. Although I do have a big head.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Wow.. What more can one say!!!
customer_reviews.text: Brought these headphones! So I thought let's put them to the test.. On the Eurostar listening to Ludovico Einaudi - Una Mattina.. not a word of a lie!! I honestly thought I was live in concert!! I have had many headphones including Bose 700! This honestly is on another level! Great all rounder headphones for all types of music...
customer_reviews.author: Suri

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality at its best
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are fantastic. They deliver sound quality at its very best and are comfortable and easy to use. I can't praise them enough although the noise cancellation can only be adjusted from an app on a smart phone which I find most unhelpful. Why can't the app be use from a laptop computer?
customer_reviews.author: Keith West Yorks

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but a pain to set up
customer_reviews.text: Solid headphones with great sound quality, comfortable and very good battery life. Setting it up the first time was a PAIN. I ended up having to find very obscure instructions on an Apple forum on how to reset the headphones, remove all other Bluetooth connections on my phone and reboot multiple times to finally get it working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Waited for the new PX7 to be released but preferred the look of these. Design and build quality is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: MWW

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound and build, good Noise Cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancellation might not be quite as effective as my previous Bose QC's, but these B&W's sound so much nicer. It brings music to life. Take note: it's a tight fit, bigger heads might struggle.
customer_reviews.author: S De Hoogh

customer_reviews.title: B&W Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Step up from P5 in sound quality, Bluetooth connection excellent with astell & kern player. Finish typical B&W (good). Fit good over my big ears.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S

customer_reviews.title: excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality. Better than B&O. But very heavy and rigid. Unfortunately had to return them back.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Bowers wilkins px
customer_reviews.text: Bowers are the best when it comes to design quality. I loved the small details such as music mutes if you remove headphones and plays from where you left however the sound quality compared to Sony and Bose was way off. Headphones rumbled when faced with low frequency. If only they could get that right the noise cancellation doesn’t matter.
customer_reviews.author: Zamajuu

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not for me
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy and bulky. Nice sound and good build quality but just not comfortable. Returned
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and build quality, worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality as you would expect from Bowers and Wilkins, noise cancelling is good but not quite up to Bose standards. The app is eay to use and user friendly, battery life is OK, I personally think that the headphones are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jasonpashton

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: fit too unforgiving to wear, headache-inducing. purchased B&O instead, no comparison.
customer_reviews.author: L. J. P

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth headset with terrible bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Trying to use this with a windows laptop and an iPhone is an excercise in futility. The bluetooth pairing is so bad that it will not swap between devices. i have just cleared the pairing with my iphone and i cannot make the PX headset visible to the phone again. Unfortunately I kept it too long to return. Avoid, do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Absolyelu love these, used to always go for in ear but I'll never go back. The noice cancelling is great, especially as there is a lot of constuction noise where I am, great for flying too. Battery life is excellent as is the sound quality. Highly reccomended. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Wish i could pair them to more devices
customer_reviews.text: Love them soooo much... just wish i could pair them with a few more listening devices.. so have to get out lead provided which is not long enough... studied reviews for ages and it was these or the Bose
customer_reviews.author: Pillaton Referee

customer_reviews.title: Sticky phones
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound however upon using the phones for an hour I discovered the play pause button kept sticking. Eventually it gave up. So I returned the product, not at all happy.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Super quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: Used on long haul flight, brilliant at blocking out the plane’s engine noise and 3 crying babies,! Superb sound quality would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: 1 Debbie H

customer_reviews.title: Great  price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for this price great sound and noise cancellation
customer_reviews.author: Goo

customer_reviews.title: Shame about the comfort
customer_reviews.text: great sounding well built but the cost is the weight, and they become uncomfortable if worn for a while...thats the only reason I returned them. Shame
customer_reviews.author: David Barbour

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound. I would like to be able to adjust bass and treble but still sounds great. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Erimus

customer_reviews.title: Amazing build quality and crystal-clear sound
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality and looking beautiful 😊 Bluetooth wireless connection is amazing works with any device as amazing app for your mobile phone or other devices so you can go into the settings so easy to use and works well, build quality is brilliant as well the sound quality is clear and crisp not like Dr Dre's headphones.
customer_reviews.author: nil

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, sound insanely brilliant. Bought a second pair as a gift. Completely work the price label! Plus, I get compliments in them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Hbrook

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones easy to set up battery life reasonable nice case to hold headphones and charge cable comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: David Siddall

customer_reviews.title: One of the best wireless headphones out there!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing battery life with great sound quality; highly recommended!!! I use these for both work (calls) and music; it works like a charm. There is no background (amplified) noise, the noise and active cancellation works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Ravindra Savant

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Excellent battery life the sound quality is superb and very good noise cancellation love these headphone far superior build quality than my previous bose headphones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, but noise cancelling is sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Really great sound and very easy to use! Battery life is good. Robust. Easy to store. Only issue (which could be due to my ear size) sometimes the noise cancelling momentarily stops as a move my head left.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Well made, great Audio quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my partners Christmas and they haven't been off her head since :D
customer_reviews.author: Chris J

customer_reviews.title: Issues have gone
customer_reviews.text: Any issues that the headset had before have been fixed, very good quality headphones deserving of all its rewards
customer_reviews.author: Longsdale

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, amazing customer service from B&W!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, nice to use and look the part in gold trim! After nearly 2 years of use, headphones had a fault, contacted B&W who (after sending back foc) replaced them without issue, amazing customer service can't recommend highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Snug and wasteful
customer_reviews.text: Far too tight on the head, not comfortable and definitely not worth the price. Instead, I would go for Bose QC or Sony hands down.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing
customer_reviews.text: Superb sound quality, comfort and ease of use- highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: M J Holtom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for an open office environment
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones. Good sound quality, noise cancelling works great, and play-music-when-putting-headphones-on is a nice feature to have.
customer_reviews.author: Martín Fixman

customer_reviews.title: The batttery failed .
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound, great features. Unfortunately the battery failed after 6 weeks, now I am ambivalent .
customer_reviews.author: Harri Seppänen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality and noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Chose these headphones for the quality. I've used Bose before but I decided to try these and certainly not disappointed so far Good battery life ,noise cancellation is good with no complaints
customer_reviews.author: jao faleye

customer_reviews.title: The best £300 headphones
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had b o and Bose headphones and these beat both on sound and quality,can’t fault them.
customer_reviews.author: swampshopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The best looking headphones on the market I love wearing this head set
customer_reviews.author: Badboyrd

customer_reviews.title: Good sound of these
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter for Christmas. She loves them and says they are great quality
customer_reviews.author: Dawnee22

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is very good.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very good. Noise cancellation is not so good. But it suits me. I am enjoying the preety good music and voice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, good looking and give the feeling of being a quality bit of kit. Linked to my phone easily, though as intuitive to use as bose head sets I’ve had before.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Fawn

customer_reviews.title: Great sound !!
customer_reviews.text: Used for music and films , and did my research before I purchased, and I’ve not been disappointed. On the minor negative side, the on/off switch is a little fiddly.
customer_reviews.author: Terence S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these headphones, the quality is tops the sound is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Henstock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Sound
customer_reviews.text: A real pleasure to listen to, superb quality sound producing every detail, have many useful features, very pleased I chose these.
customer_reviews.author: RoyB

customer_reviews.title: Overall great pair of headphones especially on discount
customer_reviews.text: Using it in my daily routine, going to and back from work, in the gym as well as when chilling listening to music at home. The sound is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Georgi Mirazchiyski

customer_reviews.title: great headphone
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this product. I experienced no problem. The sound quality as well as the comfort are superb.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Immersive Sound Stage
customer_reviews.text: Give the phone 35 hours of play! And You will feel the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellant sound and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought them as a Xmas gift and I am informed they are excellant
customer_reviews.author: caroline

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and superioro
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best... if you are looking for a pair of headphones which can accurately sustain a dynamic soundscape with authority and total emersion... these are the best around. Not cheap, but awesome for audiophiles. Ignore the comments about comfort, the PX are plenty comfortable. No they are not exactly discreet, but I don’t care how they look, because they sound great! (Which is why for the price they are worth every penny. Supported by a great App, these headphones are a must have for anyone serious about sound rather than fashion
customer_reviews.author: martin thomas

customer_reviews.title: The best headpones out there
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build. Stylish. Not heavy. Firm but not tight fit. The sound is excellent. Best that I have heard. I prefer these over my Bose QC25s. Some important adjustments can only be made using a App and Bluetooth. Both wireless and wired sound is very involving. Remarkable clarity and detail. I now know what they mean by 'timing'. Excellent timing and precision in the sound. I am hearing depths and details that I have not heard before. They really make the music more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Gwynn T. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Hugely dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Ok so initially I left a positive review, was happy with the sound BUT since then I've had nothing but issues with the earphones. They constantly pause music for no reason connected to different devices, they drop Bluetooth connectivity to a brand new iPhone. Now I struggle to get them to connect, when I do they are connected but I get no sound through the earphones. I'm massively disappointed, IF amazon will refund I will go back to the BOSE earphones I previously had. They just work.
customer_reviews.author: Slanted1401

customer_reviews.title: Incompatible with glasses
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace my B+W P7W headphones which were amazing! These are not as good! I travel the world with Bands for a living. A top end roadie if you will. I have mixed many albums too. These are not a patch on the older model in terms of sound and build. Also they start and stop all the time if you wear glasses. Really not keen but they still sound better than any Bose ones. Sound quality suffers terribly when you engage the noise cancelling too. Also the cloth is coming off. Cannot recommend them I’m afraid and I’ve really persevered and burned them in etc
customer_reviews.author: Geez

customer_reviews.title: Without doubt the best headphones I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Without doubt the best headphones I have ever owned. Been a Bose fan for years. I still am, but these blow their headphones out of the water. Very comfortable, and noise cancellation is superb. Quality of sound; well, it feels like I've just regained my hearing. Expensive - yes. Worth the price - yes.
customer_reviews.author: spfthink

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones.. very good sound
customer_reviews.text: Functionality is very good with these headphones and easily connect with blue tooth devices ( except ipad with latest upgrade???). B&W were hopeless at givibg support. I prefer to link them with a cable when using my hifi as the sound is better.
customer_reviews.author: Metalnik

customer_reviews.title: 6 month review.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I have had these for half a year now, here is my experience. Battery life is great. Connectivity is easy to android/iphone/ipad/laptop. They are quite tight fitting on my head, they fit my 4yr olds head ok! My wife says her £30 skull candys have better sound, I think the B&W are only marginally better. If they were to break or get stolen I would not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Customer007

customer_reviews.title: really wanted to like them, good sound great looking sadly even after ...
customer_reviews.text: really wanted to like them, good sound great looking sadly even after the firmware upgrade like many reviews constant dropout...
customer_reviews.author: neil

customer_reviews.title: Very good but not perfect for price
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality and look of these is very good. However, they have stoped working a few times and I’ve had to reset them. Discovering this when out and about is not ideal as it means I have had to go without music for days at a time until I’ve been home and found an object small enough to fit in the reset button. Not impress by the noise cancelling, it did not drown out the hen party on my train at all. They reduce the noise on planes a little but I could still hear the crying babies. They are very heavy so can’t really wear while walking as they fall off my head.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best hp i ever had ! Great sound after few days of listening .
customer_reviews.author: Brad J

product_meta.title: Bowers & Wilkins PX Active Noise Cancelling Wireless Headphones, Best-in-class Sound, Soft Gold
product_meta.description:
Color:GoldIntroducing PX: headphones just got a lot more personal. PX isn't just a new headphone. We've created not just the best-sounding noise-cancelling headphones you've ever heard, but headphones that are so intelligently designed, and so responsive, you might forget you're wearing them at all. Bluetooth codecs - aptX HD (High Definition) Standard Latency plus HD SBC (Low Complexity Sub-band Coding) AAC (Advanced Audio Coding) 

With PX, everything just works in seamless harmony with your environment and the way you naturally listen to music. 

Combine intuitive controls with a beautiful ergonomic design and best-in-class acoustic performance, and you have something unique: a set of wireless headphones that will transform how you experience and enjoy music. 

Features:
• Adaptive noise cancelling
• Advanced Bluetooth 4.1 with aptX-HD for hi-res streaming
• Natural UI - Built-in sensors handle functions like stopping audio playback when you remove the headphones 
• World class acoustics from 40mm full range drivers 
• Premium materials and build quality 
• Rechargeable battery (up to 22 hours of battery life) 
• Mobile companion app for personalizing audio playback 

Specifications:
• Inputs: 3.5mm stereo jack for optional wired playback 
• USB-C (Audio, Battery charging, and Firmware update)
• Drive units: 40mm diameter 
• Full Range Drivers Performance: 10Hz to 20kHz 
• Frequency Range 22 ohms (passive) 
• Impedance <0.3% (1kHz/10mW) 
• Distortion (THD) 111 dB/V at 1kHz 
• Sensitivity 1V 
• Maximum input power 
• Dimensions: 2.95 in Deep 6.89 in Wide 7.87 in Tall
• Weight: 0.83 pounds
feature_bullets: ADAPTIVE NOISE CANCELLATION - Perfect sound anywhere - on a plane, in the street or in the office. The best adaptive noise cancelling headphones, customizable to your exact preference.

FEEL MORE OF YOUR MUSIC - Built with the same drive units from our P9 Signature headphones, the PX provides optimized listening performance. We have also subtly angled the drivers to provide a more natural stereo perspective.
PX RESPONDS TO YOU - When you need to pause, lift an ear cup. Put PX down and it goes to sleep. Pick it up to resume playing. Worry less about your headphones and enjoy your music more.

SMART POWER -Battery type -850mAh-Lithium Polymer. Battery life- Upto 22 hours BT/ANC, Upto 29 hours BT/no ANC, Upto 33 hours ANC/wired, Upto 50 hours wired/no ANC. PX is always ready; put it down and it goes into power-saving sleep mode; pick it up and you're good to go. PX is the smartest Bluetooth headphone on the market.
TO GET THE BEST FROM PX, install the latest version of the firmware. This is done via the dedicated Bowers & Wilkins Headphones app, downloadable for free from the AppStore or Google Play Store.
Frequency response - 10Hz to 20kHz and Impedance - 22 ohms (passive). Bluetooth profiles - A2DP v1.3, AVRCP v1.6, HFP v1.6, HSP v1.2, GAP, SDAP, DIP
